html:
4.28.17  8:46 am   Have you already finished the mixing or is that among the many many little things that need to be done, scattered throughout the video?

     mixing is done. there is a huge list of small things to fix, the majority of which are in the graphics
4.28.17  8:28 am   Will you put more of your music on spotify?

4.28.17  6:15 am   Will the fixes take longer than the jingles?

     i don't know but i have been doing both as quickly as possible

4.28.17  6:14 am   Do you feel comfortable about giving an estimate for when the video is done?

     no

4.28.17  5:08 am   what's your planet?

     the same one as yours

4.28.17  3:09 am   I like to organize my thoughts with Post-it Notes. In what ways do you prefer to waste hours of your time under the guise of productivity?

     none

4.28.17  3:05 am   Any strong feelings about snakes?

     no

4.28.17  3:03 am   Did you know Shania Twain is Mark Twain's daughter?

     she is not

4.28.17  2:39 am   R mdex ixckrxqsxs umx parkdgp. Ivj ixcvkx lx.

     i'm not sure that's necessary, i'm friends with them too

4.28.17  1:45 am   What's your favourite musical cadence?

     i'm not too interested in discriminating what qualifies as a cadence and what does not

4.28.17  1:32 am   % completion of your current project? I need to make sure I don't die before it releases.

     i don't know

4.28.17  1:26 am   here is a challenge, write me a lyric

     i only write lyrics together with music

4.28.17  1:23 am   why do we often try to be things that we already are

     perhaps to continue being that way, in the future. or maybe even better

4.27.17  11:51 pm   Are you sure potatoes are real?

     yes

4.27.17  11:31 pm   What is your favorite social taboo

     telling the truth
4.27.17  11:22 pm   when u gonna upload agian

4.27.17  11:02 pm   how do i become i n d i f f e r e n t

     i don't care

4.27.17  10:42 pm   Is HOTEWIG just going to be History of the World with Q&A slowed down 150 times?

     no

4.27.17  10:26 pm   will you ever be the same?

     as what

4.27.17  9:59 pm   where do you draw the line between music and video ? or how ? Sometime when i watch your videos i wonder if during a bill wurtz concert the video would be projected behind the stage, becoming almost like massive karaoke. Would you like to do concerts?

     yes but i'm not interested in using any pre-recorded video or audio for a live show

4.27.17  9:53 pm   when did you first realise that you aren't real?

     i am real, but i respect your opinion

4.27.17  9:53 pm   it seems like a crazy thing to catch up with more than 1 year of reality :o

     yea but not nearly as crazy as the 5 years i caught up in 2016
4.27.17  9:51 pm   do you plan on updating reality?

4.27.17  9:28 pm   I have two very important questions about the new video. one is will people learn about more than just history from it,

     probably

      and another is will it have puns?

     yes

4.27.17  9:28 pm   Would you sacrifice a pygmy goat to our great lord Loqthar?

     not right now

4.27.17  9:18 pm   there is a basketball player on the chicago bulls with the last name canaan, and he is a rookie, so he is a new player, so his is a new canaan. what are your opinions on this?

     i believe you

4.27.17  9:06 pm   Do you enjoy being challenged or doing something easy?

     both please

4.27.17  8:18 pm   Will your next video have a similar pace/tone/feel as history of Japan?

     yes

4.27.17  8:05 pm   there is a really cool organization at my school I always wanted to join, but I'm graduating this year and as such will never be able to join. this really fucks with me in a bad, bad way. do u have any tips on how to feel better in this situation

     there are even cooler organizations. perhaps even ones you may start yourself

4.27.17  8:00 pm   will the new video live up to the hype

     i think it's probably crazier than most people realize

4.27.17  7:57 pm   Judging from the recent instagram post, have we hit the stage where you begin to start dropping even crazier hints because the video will come out really pretty soon?

     yes

4.27.17  7:55 pm   Do you consider yourself to be good at multitasking?

     it depends on the tasks

4.27.17  7:54 pm   Am I bored?

     i don't know

4.27.17  7:17 pm   Wouldn't it be just as crazy if there were no life on any planet?

     weirdly enough i don't think the universe would exist, in that case

4.27.17  7:12 pm   are the four horseman (from that reality video) still improv, songs, long videos, & behind the scenes stuff for you? bc i think you said you plan on giving long videos a break for a bit after hotewig is done so

     3 out of the 4 have been checked off, at least in the context of that list. that list was about major 'unopened' categories

4.27.17  7:02 pm   DO U EVER JUST ????????????????REALIZE THAT THE RULES ARENT REAL

     oh hell yeah

4.27.17  6:59 pm   Is your new video about an Empire or something?

     not exactly

4.27.17  6:58 pm   What is the best antidepressant, in your opinion?

     exploration

4.27.17  6:53 pm   what do i do if the sky is falling

     the sky already fell. how do you think it got on top of us
4.27.17  6:30 pm   what do you find funny? besides business suits of course

4.27.17  6:14 pm   what can you tell me about panda bares

     i think they originate in china, and they are mostly black and white

4.27.17  5:53 pm   what is an emotional zawinul?

     a lead sound i made
4.27.17  5:26 pm   Pizza or french fries?

4.27.17  5:00 pm   Do you think there is something wrong with the modern culture of entertainment?

     i'm not sure what you mean

4.27.17  4:55 pm   Are you planning on making anymore long videos after this one, because whilst they take time, they are fantastic, and you have definitely inspired millions with hOJ!

     i am looking forward to medium length projects

4.27.17  4:51 pm   Drop some knowledge

     i am trying
4.27.17  4:45 pm   do you like spaghetti

4.27.17  4:44 pm   do you think things matter? Of course things matter to individuals but do they actually matter to the universe?

     of course. why do you think the universe made all this matter in the first place

4.27.17  4:42 pm   Mr Wurtz, sir! Millions of capital letters are going homeless, how do you feel?

     i'm not sure what you mean. but hopefully my alphabet shuffle video can be a nice home for them

4.27.17  4:29 pm   your answers are pretty boring

     your question is boring
